pages.text: The Catcher will catch any bees flying over it, as long as it's supplied with cages. You can put a pollination block/item or $(l:blocks/machines/feeder)Feeding Slab$(/l) on top to attract specific bees.

The Catcher accepts three types of upgrades. A $(l:items/upgrades#babee)BaBee upgrade$(/l) will filter out adult bees and only catch BaBees, using a $(l:items/upgrades#filter)Filter upgrade$(/l) it will only catch the bees specified in the filter, and finally, a $(l:items/upgrades#range)Range upgrade$(/l) will increase the range in which it catches bees. Multiple Range upgrades can be installed.
